sentences.en: A bag of fig rolls lay snugly in Armstrong's satchel.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗的书包里悄悄地摆着一袋无花果夹心面包卷.

sentences.en: Female juror sees laugh into next satchel.
sentences.cn: 女陪审员看了看会心一笑然后放进了随身的挎包.

sentences.en: He carefully balanced the satchel so that its contents would not spill out onto the floor.
sentences.cn: 他仔细地把小背包放好，不让里面的东西掉到地板上。

sentences.en: He carried his books in his school satchel.
He go off to school with a satchel over his shoulder.
He rested his left handlightly but firmly on the half-opened flap of  his  satchel.
sentences.cn: 他将左手放松，但却紧紧抓住了半开口的小背包。

sentences.en: He went off to school with a satchel over his shoulder.
Hela first , then Manya threw down muff and satchel and began excitedly choosing their own apples.
sentences.cn: 先是海拉,接着是玛尼娅,都脱掉手套,放下书包, 高兴地挑选起自己要的苹果来.

sentences.en: Homework carries with the car, satchel became food bag.
sentences.cn: 家庭作业用车载, 书包成了食品袋.

sentences.en: I packed my satchel and went with him.
sentences.cn: 我就收拾行李,和他同去了.

sentences.en: I unburdened the boy of his satchel.
sentences.cn: 我从那孩子的肩上解下书包.

sentences.en: Mr. Samgrass delved again into his pigskin satchel.
sentences.cn: 桑格拉斯先生就去掏他那个猪皮小提包了.

sentences.en: Outstanding opened the door, lose satchel toward the chair, off the shoe, lie on the bed.
sentences.cn: 杰开了门, 把书包往椅子上一丢, 把鞋一脱, 便躺在床上.

sentences.en: Talbot slid his closed book into his satchel.
sentences.cn: 塔尔博特把他那本阖上的书,轻轻地放进书包.

sentences.en: The little boy carries his satchel and goes to school.
sentences.cn: 小二郎背着书包去学堂.

sentences.en: To be sure, his hand satchel.

trans.tran_en: a leather bag that you carry over your shoulder, used especially in the past by children for carrying books to school
